decks.name: Rendering in React boop bop
decks.description: React's component structure allows for quickly building a complex web application that relies on DOM manipulation. womp womp womp

decks.name: React Router
decks.description: React Router is a collection of navigational components that compose declaratively with your application.

cards.front: Differentiate between Real DOM and Virtual DOM.
cards.back: Virtual DOM updates are faster but do not directly update the HTML

cards.front: How do you modify the state of a different React component?
cards.back: Not at all! State is visible to the component only.

cards.front: How do you pass data 'down' to a React child component?
cards.back: As properties or props hmmmm hhh

cards.front:
What path will match the follow Route? WOWWOWOWOWO
<Route>
  <NotFound />
</Route> zzzzzzzzz
cards.back: All paths. A route with no path matches all URL's LAAAA ppppppp asdkjlkla /////// yayayayayaya

cards.front: What does <Switch> do? Eat's my shorts!
cards.back: Renders the first matching child <Route> booyakasha  EAT MY SHORTS hiphiphooray!!
